trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around February 8th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI WORK FOR SOUTHWEST AIRLINES..I WAS WAITING FOR MY NEXT FLIGHT TO PROVISION. I WAS TALKING TO A FELLOW AGENT WHEN I LOOKED UP TO THE SKY AS I WAS TALKING AND NOTICED A TRIANGLE SHAPED SMALL OBJECT COMING FROM THE SOUTH...1 LIGHT AT THE HEAD-3 DOWN EACH SIDE OF THE TRIANGLE..IT LOOKED REALLY WERID..IT WAS UP VERY HIGH..BUT I COULD MAKE OUT THE 7 LITTLE LIGHTS..THEN IT TURNED LEFT (EAST) AND SLOWLY FADED AWAY! IT WAS GREAT TO SEE CAUSE IT DID'NT LOOK NORMAL IN THE NIGHT SKY. IT WAS UP TO HIGH TO SEE ANY DETAIL EXCEPT THE 7 LIGHTS. IT LOOKED LIKE SOMETHING FROM A VIDEO GAME PROJECTED IN THE NIGHT SKY. I KEPT THINKING? WHAT IS THAT?
